name: Mike Hughes
text: Ordered medium thin crust double pepperoni pizza and the marble cookie brownie.  Both were very delicious and will definitely order again.

name: Ben Owen
text: Recently ordered a pizzas and sandwiches. Long story short pizzas were well made but the sandwiches were not. I've posted pictures of the sandwich with my review, and as you can see the habanero "chicken" sandwich is almost entirely cheese, ‚Ä¶More

name: debra minor
text: I love dominos pizza.  I just didn't appreciate the fact that the cook didn't have a mask on. All the other workers had their masks on. It was bad enough he didn't have gloves on but not to have a mask on  is not right.  This is not going to stop me from going to dominos.  But I think that they need to be more careful

name: Lysaundra Jones
text: The local Domino's is awesome. The delivery people are so nice and helpful, always. I deliver to family members and work without problem.

name: Aja Vaden
text: The only reason I give it 1 star is because I have to. I used to order at least once a week 2 hours early to make sure I got my food at lunchtime. They were 28 minutes late even with the 2 hours they had to get my food less than 10 minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: Autumn Duffer
text: Love the nice customer service that was given. Nicholas Hughes made our Domino's experience a great one! Thank you for knowing how to run a great business!

name: Angela Vaden
text: Everything was great. I loved watching them fix everything. Dominos is stepping their game up. Nice clean dining area and everyone was super nice.

name: Nancy an Steve truck 33193
text: I love my Domino's, just wish they would deliver to scottsburg va

text: When they move to the new place first month was good food nice and fresh , I call to place a delivery order they took more than a hour when they told me 30 mins , late plus wrong food , I call the manager he said he can give me my money ‚Ä¶More

name: E P
text: Great pizza, their philly cheese is probably the best pizza in town. New location is more convenient , delivery times are pretty good as well.

name: Vinnie Tedeschi
text: Great service! Very good pizza!

name: James Rutherford
text: I love Domino's. I got my first free pizza thru the rewards program just the other night. Charged me 2.99 for delivery. The best pizza is free pizza. And this was no exception. Thanks again, Dominos. Customer challenge: Hit me with your best buffalo chicken pizza!!! üòúüòùü§§

name: Lesa Puckett
text: I haven't eaten at Domino's in forever and the other night I got a sudden craving for their pizza and wanted to try one of their sandwiches ... WHAT A JOKE! They are listed as being open until 12 AM ... I started calling at 11:11 PM and NO ONE ANSWERED the PHONE! SHAME ON YOU!

name: Teedra P. Madera
text: Glad they owned the new store,  very clean and service was good.

name: CHARLETTA EDMONDS
text: Great service!

name: Jessica Waddell
text: The last 2 orders I placed with them took an hour or a little longer to get my order. Once I received my order, it was cold. The 2nd order was cold, the pizza overcooked, & I also did not receive the salad I ordered. This location is ‚Ä¶More

text: Waited an hour for my food the manager seen what happened and gave me my order for free and it was great

text: Fast friendly service every time I go there Best pizza u can find is right here

text: The service is slow

name: Jeff Oakes
text: Great food selection, nice staff but store needs upgrading.

name: Vicky Wilkins
text: Friendly and prompt with the food

name: Devin K.
text: You can call order a pizza and by the time you get there the pizza is hot and ready. You can also order at the counter and wait but it doesn't take very long at all before they got it. The service is great the people who work there are very nice and friendly. I recommend this place if your down for some pizza.

name: Patrick Coughlin
text: We always receive prompt service.  The orders are correct and the delivery personnel are very professional and pleasant.  I would recommend Domino's to anyone who does not want to go out to pick up pizza.

text: Ordered online and everything was exactly as I ordered. The customer service was great!

name: Josh Taylor
text: Excellent customer service everytime I head over to this store! My food is always perfectly made! A big shout out to Nick and his crew at the Southboston location you guys rock!!!

name: David Irby
text: Terrible food quality, and slow delivery time  (last order took 40 minutes to arrive).  The last pizza I ordered was so bad that I threw it out.  I couldn't even finish one slice.  I won't order from them again. ‚Ä¶More

text: We ordered online and within 20 mins had a hot and perfectly prepared pizza delivered. I would def recommend using this Domino's.

text: Pizza was ready in given time and the flavor was very good.

name: thomas varney
text: They are the best Domino's Pizza I have seen,I travel around through North Carolina and VA alot, this crew definitely has a top notch thing going please don't stop.keep the love coming.i can't say enough about the pizza experience üòÅ

text: Delivery is horrible. At one time 30 min deliver was a standard. Today it's closer to a hour and 30 mins. I literally live 10 minutes away from Domino's and I would have a better chance at hitting the lottery, then getting a Pizza in 30 ‚Ä¶More

text: I have a huge compliant with Dominos, every single time you call them they always asked can you please hold. Who does that?  Tonight I am on hold for over 6 minutes I call back and they guy says can you please hold...I asked was I going to ‚Ä¶More

text: Good pizza & hot sandwichs but no tables or place to eat, no publuc restrooms. They could put up out side seating. Across the street next to  Bank of America is a small park we use!!
